attributes.action: Cap MP wage increases to inflation, or in line with NHS nurses. MPs want a 40% rise.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs already have generous benefits packages and expenses. There is considerable debate as to whether they are delivering a good service. Therefore can't justify their huge salary increases.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MPPayIncrease/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
